channel.title: Is there a google sheet created for Trophy Gold?
channel.description:
Hi all,
I believe some google sheets exist somewhere for running Trophy Gold.
Can someone point me in the right direction?

item.title: Is there a google sheet created for Trophy Gold?
item.dc:creator: @darren
item.description:
@darren wrote:

It’s available in the Gauntlet Play Aids folder on Google Drive!

Here’s the URL for that folder: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/11kvNX8LzFPLODGgnbXXGTOJ0bieDCfeF

Here’s Trophy Gold specifically: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oiH0wAWhISX_jLchbZbyaWQc8nwyH-sWJ4H5cCUBDdM

And a slightly different format, if you’d like something more compact: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zVFv3ymI3xgVRj9-KkPvNtRdLstX2G_gpW0tdpewMoo

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a google sheet created for Trophy Gold?
